title: Hello all, thank you, and Rome.
body:
Hi everyone! Firstly thank you Riot for letting me participate in the alpha testing! :)

I am actually in Italy at the moment on a sneaky holiday (and just got the acceptance email) so I'm sitting in Rome among some of the most ancient and beautiful buildings in the world, and right now just can't wait to go and play league xD

I won't be able to actually start the alpha testing until I get back in a week, so I was wondering if anyone would be kind enough to fill me in on some of the main points of interest and issues that are currently circulating, so that when I get back and jump into testing, I'm aware of some of the issues and am not posting feedback about things that have already been discussed while I was away.

Thanks :)

look forward to working with everyone and trying to nut out the alpha client :)

{{champion:268}} {{champion:136}}
